channel.title: [PI] Verprex - Where Hybrids Show Their Skills
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello members of MoparScape
Over the past 4-5 i have been working, playing around with Rsps coding & hosting. But now it's time to give it all i got! I have ALWAYS enjoyed 317's & especially Hybriding, i just love it. This server's combat is nearly flawless along with switching! One of the best Switching you will ever find on a 317!
[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/468306-pi-verprex-pi-508-maps.html"]Development Page[/URL] [url=http://www.verprex.org/webclient.php]Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.verprex.org/index.php]Home[/url] [url=http://www.verprex.org/Verprex.jar]Client[/url] Server Features:
- • Correct Gs's stances - • Vote4Points - • Highscores (Soon) - • KC - • DC - • KDR - • 100% Flawless Switching - • New Void - • Vesta - • Dragon Claws - • Korasi - • Zuriels - • Torva - • Vitrus - • Pernix - • All Nex Amours! - • Functional magics. - • Near-perfect combat. - • Bug free mini-games. - • Great training facilities. - • Various PKing teleports. - • All skills functional. - • Realistic economy. - • Active and friendly staff. - • Items on death interface. - • Curses working. - • Working hand cannon w/ special. - • Working EXP counter. - • Auto donation system. - Soon - • Vote for rewards system. - In Progress - • Player and NPC clipping in most regions. - • New combat icons. - • New hitmarks
[IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/3695/5a0855ac542a4bb19bfa854.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/E5qxS4p.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c3BMdXO.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EHPU84F.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CFCpquT.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3tDBZmC.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/2241/a26129cb4fad4274bda3c84.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GbH1IO4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wLNXWeu.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: [PI] Verprex - Where Hybrids Show Their Skills
item.dc:creator: @Verprex Verprex
item.description:
@Verprex wrote:

[CENTER]Hello members of MoparScape

Over the past 4-5 i have been working, playing around with Rsps coding & hosting. But now it’s time to give it all i got!
I have ALWAYS enjoyed 317’s & especially Hybriding, i just love it.
This server’s combat is nearly flawless along with switching! One of the best Switching you will ever find on a 317!

Development Page
Webclient
Home
Client
Server Features:

  • • Correct Gs’s stances
  • • Vote4Points
  • • Highscores (Soon)
  • • KC
  • • DC
  • • KDR
  • • 100% Flawless Switching
  • • New Void

  • • All Nex Amours!

  • • Near-perfect combat.
  • • Bug free mini-games.
  • • Great training facilities.
  • • Various PKing teleports.
  • • All skills functional.
  • • Realistic economy.
  • • Active and friendly staff.
  • • Items on death interface.
  • • Curses working.
  • • Working hand cannon w/ special.
  • • Working EXP counter.
  • • Auto donation system. - Soon
  • • Vote for rewards system. - In Progress
  • • Player and NPC clipping in most regions.
  • • New combat icons.
  • • New hitmarks
